data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Gaziantep with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gaziantep, Turkey

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Gaziantep to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Gaziantep, Turkey.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Gaziantep, Turkey to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
the state of Gaziantep has (about) 692 people who know Jesus, 10,325 people who know about him culturally, and 1,833,383 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Gaziantep.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gaziantep, Turkey has a population of 1,844,400.

We estimate Gaziantep has 692 people who might know Jesus, 10,325 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,833,383 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 99.4 percent of the people of Gaziantep are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
